member.summary: Event raised whenever a log message is emitted from ANY active check.

member.summary: Event raised whenever a status change occurs in ANY active check.

member.summary: Starts a synthetic performance probe for the specified media in a background task. Returns immediately.

member.name: T:FrameDropCheck.Plugin.Services.IJellyfinApiService
member.summary: Abstraction over Jellyfin internal APIs that the service may use to retrieve metadata and session/playback information. Implement this interface using the platform services available in the Jellyfin plugin host when integrating the plugin.

member.summary: Try to get media metadata from Jellyfin by id. Returns null when not found.

member.name: M:FrameDropCheck.Plugin.Services.IJellyfinApiService.GetPlaybackDiagnosticsAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieve playback/session diagnostics for a particular media id. The concrete return type is intentionally left as string (JSON) for flexibility.

member.summary: Service responsible for searching and analyzing FFmpeg transcode logs for frame drops.

member.summary: Event raised whenever a log message is emitted during analysis.

member.summary: Analyzes available logs for the specified media to detect frame drops.
member.returns: A JSON string containing the analysis result (frames_dropped, total_frames, events).

member.name: T:FrameDropCheck.Plugin.Services.InternalJellyfinApiService
member.summary: A conservative internal Jellyfin API service implementation. This implementation prefers local DB (`IMediaRepository`) and, when running inside Jellyfin, will attempt to discover useful services from the host's DI container via . All attempts are logged; absence of a specific internal service will be handled gracefully and a safe default will be returned.

member.name: M:FrameDropCheck.Plugin.Services.InternalJellyfinApiService.#ctor(System.IServiceProvider,FrameDropCheck.Plugin.Infrastructure.Repositories.IMediaRepository,FrameDropCheck.Plugin.Infrastructure.Logging.IAppLogger)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Service provider used to discover internal Jellyfin services at runtime.

member.name: M:FrameDropCheck.Plugin.Services.InternalJellyfinApiService.GetMediaAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Try to obtain media information. Prioritizes local DB; if not found, attempts to locate Jellyfin internal item services dynamically.

member.name: M:FrameDropCheck.Plugin.Services.InternalJellyfinApiService.GetPlaybackDiagnosticsAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Attempts to obtain playback diagnostics (drop counts) from Jellyfin internals. Currently returns a safe default if no internal session service is available.
